name: earthspi_kill_01
text: I till the soil of your flesh.
text_simple: i till the soil of your flesh

name: earthspi_kill_03
text: Your flesh is soft. Your Spirit weak.
text_simple: your flesh is soft your spirit weak

name: earthspi_kill_05
text: Do not focus on the agony.
text_simple: do not focus on the agony

name: earthspi_kill_10
text: Would that I could kill you without pain.
text_simple: would that i could kill you without pain

name: earthspi_kill_11
text: I am harsh, so you may learn.

name: earthspi_kill_14
text: You die well, but fought horribly.
text_simple: you die well but fought horribly

name: earthspi_kill_15
text: You are learned in the ways of dying.

name: earthspi_rival_01
criteria: Kill Isearth_spirit IsEnemyEmber_Spirit Chance_25%|Kill Isearth_spirit IsEnemyStormSpirit Chance_25%
pretty_criteria: Killing Ember Spirit (25% chance)|Killing Storm Spirit (25% chance)

name: earthspi_rival_05
text: Your vice plagues you no more.
text_simple: your vice plagues you no more

name: earthspi_rival_06
text: Your roots will find no purchase in this earth.
text_simple: your roots will find no purchase in this earth

name: earthspi_rival_07
text: Stone artisan, you forget your betters.
text_simple: stone artisan you forget your betters

name: earthspi_rival_08
text: Finally, a foe who is not soft. Instead, you were brittle.
text_simple: finally a foe who is not soft instead you were brittle

name: earthspi_rival_09
text: I was going to explain your origins, but you died too quickly. Ah well.
text_simple: i was going to explain your origins but you died too quickly ah well

name: earthspi_rival_10
text: I return you to the soil from whence you came.
text_simple: i return you to the soil from whence you came

name: earthspi_rival_11
text: Titan, you'll shatter the Earth no more.
text_simple: titan youll shatter the earth no more

name: earthspi_rival_12
text: You were a force to be reckoned with.
text_simple: you were a force to be reckoned with

name: earthspi_rival_13
text: Go toward the light, Chaos Knight.
text_simple: go toward the light chaos knight

name: earthspi_rival_14
text: There's no body to even bury.
text_simple: theres no body to even bury

name: earthspi_rival_17
text: The great terror is no more.
text_simple: the great terror is no more

name: earthspi_rival_18
text: Tusk, your snowball was no match for my boulders.
text_simple: tusk your snowball was no match for my boulders

name: earthspi_rival_22
text: Sand King, you burrow no more.
text_simple: sand king you burrow no more

name: earthspi_rival_23
text: I expected more from a Fundamental.
text_simple: i expected more from a fundamental

name: earthspi_rival_24
text: My greatest prophet, I had to put you down.
text_simple: my greatest prophet i had to put you down

name: earthspi_rival_25
text: Prophet, you turn against the one you should revere.
text_simple: prophet you turn against the one you should revere

name: earthspi_rival_27
text: You are no prophet of mine.
text_simple: you are no prophet of mine

name: earthspi_rival_28
text: You keen folk are clever, but not so strong.
text_simple: you keen folk are clever but not so strong

name: earthspi_rival_29
text: I send you to your ancestors.
text_simple: i send you to your ancestors

name: earthspi_rival_32
text: Enchantress, you have lost your way.
text_simple: enchantress you have lost your way

name: earthspi_rival_34
text: In you, the great wheel is broken.
text_simple: in you the great wheel is broken

name: earthspi_rival_35
text: Undying, I return you to the cycle of life.
text_simple: undying i return you to the cycle of life

name: earthspi_rival_36
text: You were an abomination to the great cycle.
text_simple: you were an abomination to the great cycle

name: earthspi_rival_37
text: Weave your way out of that.
text_simple: weave your way out of that

name: earthspi_rival_38
text: Ursa, the Earth spirit welcomes you home.
text_simple: ursa the earth spirit welcomes you home

name: earthspi_rival_39
text: You were a wound upon the Earth.
text_simple: you were a wound upon the earth

name: earthspi_rival_40
text: You were no friend to the Earth.
text_simple: you were no friend to the earth

name: earthspi_rival_41
text: What did the trees ever do to you?
text_simple: what did the trees ever do to you

name: earthspi_rival_42
pretty_criteria: Killing Keeper of the Light (25% chance)

name: earthspi_rival_void_01
text: You thought yourself above this world. It's fitting you die here.
text_simple: you thought yourself above this world its fitting you die here

name: earthspi_rival_void_02
text: We are not that which you think we are, brother.
text_simple: we are not that which you think we are brother
